alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Lucie, eastern Okeechobee and eastern Indian River Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sebastian to 12 miles east of Fort Drum to 7 miles northwest of Buckhead Ridge. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Sebastian, Vero Beach, Treasure Island, and Okeechobee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
